      • CRFTrainerByL1LabelLikelihood

        public CRFTrainerByL1LabelLikelihood(CRF crf,
                                     double l1Weight)
        Constructor for CRF trainer.
        参数:
        crf - CRF to train.
        l1Weight - Weight of L1 term in objective (l1Weight*|w|). Higher L1 weight means sparser solutions.
